kjv_def: ask, bid, boast, call, describe, give out, name, put forth, say(-ing, on), shew, speak, tell, utter
strongs_def: properly, to "lay" forth, i.e. (figuratively) relate (in words (usually of systematic or set discourse; whereas G2036 (λέγω) and G5346 (λέγω) generally refer to an individual expression or speech respectively; while G4483 (λέγω) is properly to break silence merely, and G2980 (λέγω) means an extended or random harangue)); by implication, to mean
outline:
1. to say, to speak
    1. affirm over, maintain
    2. to teach
    3. to exhort, advise, to command, direct
    4. to point out with words, intend, mean, mean to say
    5. to call by name, to call, name
    6. to speak out, speak of, mention
